function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Open plan living leading to lack of private space","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion in crowded living spaces","Mitigation":"Use flexible building systems to adapt the layout and create private spaces","Technologies":"AD-APT system with adjustable walls and screens","People":"Residents, families living in crowded spaces","Owner":"Architects, builders, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate layout design for different needs","Impact":"Inability to find suitable space for work, exercise, and privacy","Mitigation":"Implement architectural designs that allow flexible layout changes","Technologies":"Adjustable layout designs, flexible building systems","People":"Residents, families","Owner":"Architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Lack of preparation for future disease outbreaks","Impact":"Vulnerability to disease spread and inadequate quarantine experiences","Mitigation":"Prepare plans and implement actions for future disease outbreaks","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, flexible building systems for quarantine spaces","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
